page.title: 15BADMINTON
page.content: }One of the few organised sports in our area is the local{badminton club. It is held every Wednesday between 7 o'clock and 8 and about 25 children aged between 8 and 12 attend. {Badminton}is played with a badminton racket and shuttlecock.The idea is to make your opponent hit the shuttlecock out of the court or under the net or make the shuttlecock land on your opponents side of the court.You can play it in doubles and singles.When you score you change sides. If you are on a even number you move to the right and if you are on a odd number you move to the left.You can only score on your own serve it is the first player to score 15 pionts.
